Text: It says this is english and spanish, nowhere in this could i find the english, for 4.2 gig and the slowest download in history, i'm not exactly happy
there is no Englise. do not download this unless you are spanish or speak the language!
so disappointing...I was looking forward watching this wonderful film but it's not that fun when the version you get is the spanish-speaking one!

dammit i should have read the comments first before i wasted four days downloading it! the only english in this is the abba songs. was looking forward to watching this after many years since i last saw it. oh well. lets
There IS English. You have to select the English in your player or your remote, as it's not a choice on the menu.

BTW, I specified it when I uploaded the torrent. 

Quote from the OP: (Subs can only be selected during reproduction with your DVD remote, not in the menu. Only Spanish subs are in the menu).

he's right !- it is in english - you just have to find it! ........select 'idiomas' in the main menu and then 'ingles (subtitulado)' and the movie will play in english (with castellano subtitles - just turn them off after the movie has started)
fantastic!
perfect copy!!  again, will work in english, you just need to select it from the menu.  Thanks!!!
Easiest thing to do is just strip the menu and foreign audio! Use clone dvd or dvd shrink (reauthor).
